sentences.en: ...a fixed rate account guaranteeing 10.4% gross interest or 7.8% net until October.
sentences.cn: …一个能保证到10月份为止获得10.4%毛利或7.8%净利的固定利率账户。

sentences.en: 'A little strange'is a gross understatement.
sentences.cn: “ 有一点奇怪”绝对是轻描淡写.

sentences.en: “The trick in making a family film . . . is finding ways to interest grown-ups without boring, confusing, or grossing out the younger set”(&b{Christian Science Monitor})
sentences.cn: “拍家庭戏时正试图运用一些技巧。既能引起成年人的兴趣，又不使年轻人感到厌倦，迷惑或是恶心”(&b{基督教科学箴言报})

sentences.en: a gross profit of $5 million
sentences.cn: 500万美元的毛利

sentences.en: a gross profit of 5 million
sentences.cn: 500万美元的毛利

sentences.en: Gross feeder likes gross food.
sentences.cn: 滥食者爱吃粗食.

sentences.en: He abused the Admiral in the grossest terms.
sentences.cn: 他用最粗俗的字眼辱骂那位海军上将。

sentences.en: He made a gross mistake.
sentences.cn: 他犯了严重的错误.

sentences.en: He ordered twelve gross of the disks.
sentences.cn: 他订购了12罗磁盘。

sentences.en: He wears really gross holiday outfits.
sentences.cn: 他穿着十分难看的节日服装。

sentences.en: He's not just fat. He's positively gross!
sentences.cn: 他不只是胖, 他是过于肥胖!

sentences.en: His gross misman-agement left the company desperately in need of restructuring.
sentences.cn: 他管理上的重大失误使公司陷入亟须重组的境地。

sentences.en: His report was attacked as a gross distortion of the truth.
sentences.cn: 他的报告受到攻击,被指为严重歪曲事实.

sentences.en: I consider this a gross oversight on your part.
sentences.cn: 我把这件事看作是你的一大疏忽.

sentences.en: impoverished Mexicans who were arrested here by the gross.
sentences.cn: 在这里被大批逮捕的穷困的墨西哥人。

sentences.en: Interest is paid gross, rather than having tax deducted.
sentences.cn: 利息是按照总收入给付，未扣除税金。

sentences.en: National Savings gross sales in June totalled £709 million.
sentences.cn: 6月份国民储蓄机构的总销售额为7.09亿英镑。

sentences.en: She knew wherein her gross defects lay.
sentences.cn: 她知道自己的重大缺点在哪里.

sentences.en: The company grossed $16.8 million last year.
sentences.cn: 该公司去年税前收入为1680万美元。

sentences.en: The company was guilty of gross negligence.
sentences.cn: 该公司犯了重大的失职罪。

sentences.en: The goods are valued in gross profit at 20,000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 这批商品的毛利估计为两万元.

sentences.en: The gross weight of the box of chocolates is 500 grams.
sentences.cn: 那盒巧克力的全部重量是500克.

sentences.en: They were found guilty of acts of gross indecency.
sentences.cn: 他们因存在严重猥亵行为而被判有罪。

phrases.tran_cn: 建筑毛面积；总楼面面积
重大过失；严重过失；显著的疏忽
使厌恶：令人充满厌恶，使恶心
(非正式，主北美)使…作呕，令…恶心
总值；生产性固定资产总值
大体上；大批地；以批发方式（等于by the gross）；[古语]整体地；全盘地
大体上；总的说来；大量地

trans.tran_cn: 总的，毛的，严重的，令人不快的，粗鲁的

trans.tran_en: to earn £20,000 etc before tax has been taken away
to gain an amount as a total profit, or earn it as a total amount, before tax has been taken away
